Ortiz, Olivier Leblanc (2024) Chromosome-scale genome assembly and annotation of Paspalum notatum Flüggé var. saurae.Scientific Data doi: 10.1038/s41597-024-03731-0

Marine Salson, Julie Orjuela, Cédric Mariac, Leïla Zekraouï, Marie Couderc, Sandrine Arribat, Nathalie Rodde, Adama Faye, Ndjido A Kane, Christine Tranchant-Dubreuil, Yves Vigouroux, Cécile Berthouly-Salazar (2023) An improved assembly of the pearl millet reference genome using Oxford Nanopore long reads and optical mapping.G3: Genes, Genomes, Genetics doi: 10.1093/g3journal/jkad051

Kane, Christine Tranchant-Dubreuil, Yves Vigouroux, Cécile Berthouly-Salazar (2023) A strongly improved assembly of the pearl millet reference genome using Oxford Nanopore long reads and optical mapping.bioRxiv doi: 10.1101/2023.01.06.522873

{"blocks":[{"key":"era7u","text":"DNA precipitation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ff8bs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"55q22","text":"Add 500 µl of 3M NaOAc and 4 ml of isopropanol at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2ge8e","text":"Agitate horizontally at 5 rpm until DNA precipitates (medusa).\t","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d6f5k","text":"Glass hook DNA and transfer into 10 ml 70% EtOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"at8ga","text":"Glass hook DNA and transfer into a 2ml-tube with 2 ml of 70% EtOH.\t","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dotjf","text":"Centrifuge 10 min at 10000g and discard supernatant. •\t","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"53h0t","text":"Dry DNA at 45°C for 15 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4nsj4","text":"Resuspend in 100µl of sterile H2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fr0h","text":"Clean up DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6fdam","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1fd38","text":"Removing contaminants (spermidine, spermine) is mandatory for DNA library preparation using both RAD004 and LSK109 procedures.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2g7ln","text":"Purification was performed using 1X vol/vol AMPure, followed by two 70% ethanol precipation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"434l2","text":"DNA was resuspended in 50µl DNAse-free water, and the volume was adjusted to reach a DNA concentration of 300-400 ng/µl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
